input_args.text: 'Daughter of Holocaust Survivors Running for Senate Supports 2nd Amendment She also warns Americans to take Islamic threats serious Millie Weaver | Infowars.com - October 26, 2016 Comments \nMillie Weaver interviews Beverly Goldstein, Republican candidate for Ohio U.S. Senate Seat District 11. \nMrs. Goldstein, who is a daughter of Holocaust survivors, is a strong proponent of the 2nd Amendment and warns Americans to take Islamic threats serious.
